author: Football Italia staff
title: Suso: 'I want to stay at Sevilla'
description: Milan loanee Suso has settled at Sevilla and revealed he wants to remain at the Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan âfor a long timeâ.
content:
Milan loanee Suso has settled at Sevilla and revealed he wants to remain at the Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan ‘for a long time’.
Sevilla picked up the Spanish 26-year-old on a loan deal with an obligation to buy with conditions in January and with the side at third … [+964 chars]
